item.description:
City-Wide Laughing Matter Audition

The Greater Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter will host a rehearsal for all persons interested in becoming Laughing Matter Performance Volunteers. The rehearsal, part of a series of audition-oriented rehearsals, will give prospective performers an opportunity to learn first-hand about the Laughing Matter organization and the unique attributes of service-based improv comedy. 

Audition Requirements: To qualify as an Auditioner, one must attend a minimum of 4 consecutive rehearsals. Absence at 2 consecutive rehearsals, since the date of one’s first rehearsal, will terminate one’s audition.

Evaluation Criteria: Auditioners are evaluated for qualities which demonstrate commitment to service, satisfy established standards for the learning and practice of improv comedy, and suggest interpersonal fit within an ensemble. Upon a prospective volunteer’s satisfactory completion of the audition process, an Audition Committee, comprised of rostered volunteer performers and the Managing Director, will vote to either (i) extend an offer of induction (ii) suggest outside training with an option to re-audition, or (iii)  decide against induction.

The rehearsal will follow Laughing Matter rehearsal format and will comprise of a series of introductory warm up drills, skills development drills, scene work, and cool down drills. All participants will receive constructive feedback throughout the rehearsal and will have the opportunity to ask questions about their individual work.

Please contact the Managing Director with any questions concerning rehearsals or the audition process at jason@laughingmatter.org.

 

 

Greater Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lobby.

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle
